cause.description:
Im Egyptian, Hes Syrian, Shes Palestinian, they are Iraqi, Some are Saudi, Many are Algerian, you are lebanese, shes libyan, I am yemani, he is omani, my brother is kuwati, my sister is Qatari, My Mother was arab, yours was too. WE ARE BROTHERS AND SISTERS, WE ARE ARABS, WE MUST ASIDE OUR PETTY DIFFERENCES AND UNITE OR OUR HOMELAND, THE LAND OF THE ARABS, WILL ALWAYS BE FOREVER EXPLOITED AS EVIDENT BY OUR HISTORY. WE ARE ARAB. ARABS UNITE!
1. ARABS UNITING
2. the abolishment of nationalistic beliefs
3. peace around the world as an example of arab unity
cause.mission: put aside all the nationalism and tribalisim keeping arabs today apart in hopes for a untied future!
cause.name: United Arabs
